TEXT.TITLE: EMERALD HOMES <EHP> SETS INITIAL DISTRIBUTION
TEXT.BODY: Emerald Homes L.P. said its general partners declared an initial 30-ct per unit distribution payable May 15 to unitholders of record March 31. Emerald made its initial public offering February 6. Reuter
